channel.title: package_feeds_packages_node on Opde Issues Tracker
channel.description: Recent content in package_feeds_packages_node on Opde Issues Tracker

item.title: compile.33
item.description: build number: 33 re-implement command docker pull immortalwrt/opde:sdk docker run -it --rm immortalwrt/opde:sdk zsh # or bash export http_proxy= # [your proxy], do not use localhost or 127.0.0.1 export https_proxy=$http_proxy opde feeds && opde config -a make package/feeds/packages/node/compile -j$(nproc) || make package/feeds/packages/node/compile V=s Compile.txt Applying ./patches/v16.x/003-path.patch using plaintext: patching file lib/internal/modules/cjs/loader.js Applying ./patches/v16.x/004-musl_support.patch using plaintext: patching file deps/v8/src/base/platform/condition-variable.cc patching file deps/v8/src/base/platform/platform-posix.cc patching file deps/v8/src/codegen/external-reference-table.cc Applying ./patches/v16.x/007-fix_host_build_on_macos.patch using plaintext: patching file tools/gyp/pylib/gyp/generator/make.

item.title: compile.21
